00019 #ifndef _IPL98_LINE3D_H

00023 #include "../vectors/vector3d.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace ipl
00026 
00035 template<class T>
00036 class CLine3D
00037 {
00038         private: // attributes
00040                 CPoint3D<T> m_P;
00042                 CVector3D<T> m_Dir;
00043         public: // methods
00045                 CLine3D();
00049                 CLine3D(const CPoint3D<T>& P, const CVector3D<T>& Dir);
00051                 CLine3D(const CLine3D<T>& Line3D);
00054                 CLine3D<T>& operator=(const CLine3D<T>& Line3D);
00057                 inline const CVector3D<T>& GetDir() const;
00060                 inline const CPoint3D<T>& GetPoint() const;
00066                 bool Set(const CPoint3D<T>& P, const CVector3D<T>& Dir);
00075                 bool PseudoIntersect(const CLine3D<T>& L, CPoint3D<T> &PseudoIntersectionPoint, T& MinDistance);
00076 };
00077 
00078 template<class T>
00079 inline const CVector3D<T>& CLine3D<T>::GetDir() const
00080 {
00081         return m_Dir;
00082 }
00083 
00084 template<class T>
00085 inline const CPoint3D<T>& CLine3D<T>::GetPoint() const
00086 {
00087         return m_P;
00088 }
